welcome_feature_dislike_description: Dislike games you don't like and see Top Disliked Games
welcome_feature_graveyard_description: Remember games that shut down or were discontinued
welcome_feature_rating_description: Give detailed ratings and share your honest opinions
welcome_feature_emoji_description: React games with selected emojis with other folks
homepage_no_disliked_games_description: Games will appear here once users start disliking them
explore_top_disliked_description: The Most Controversial Titles Ranked by Player Reactions
explore_game_graveyard_description: Games That Have Shut Down or Been Discontinued
explore_graveyard_quote: I've always felt that 'game over' is a state of failure more for the game designer than from the player.
search_already_submitted: You have already submitted a dislike for this game
dislike_modal_description: This will add your dislike to help other players discover better games.
game_detail_be_first_to_react: Be the first to share how you feel about this game!
game_detail_sign_in_to_react_description: Please sign in to add emoji reactions to games.
diss_rating_dialog_description: The higher your score, the worse the game is!
diss_rating_sign_in_to_rate: Sign in to rate this game
diss_rating_save_failed: Failed to save rating. Please try again.
auth_ready_to_start: Ready to start your dislike journey? Sign in!
profile_no_disliked_games: You haven't disliked any games yet.
profile_quote: Ultimately, the player's experience is the truth. If the game does not feel right to them, then it is not right.
profile_quote_author: — Jesse Schell, The Art of Game Design
